hero.name: Arya Pradana,
hero.scroll: Scroll down to see the portfolio
about.title: Front End Engineer with 1+ years of professional experience and core contributor to Infinix's product suite, including USP pages, xclub, and xpark platforms. Currently working full-stack with active development on 2sweet.ai—an AI-powered platform for preserving memories, creating family trees, and hosting memorial events.
about.description: Actively expanding into Back-End development. Linux enthusiast with a passion for open-source technologies. When not coding, I'm playing guitar and bass.
about.current_job: Currently working as Front-End Engineer at Summit Global Technology.
porto.title: Recent projects and contributions

porto.projects.title: Buku Resepku
porto.projects.description: A web-based cookbook catalog application with integrated recipe browsing functionality. Developed to fulfill the Capstone Project requirements for SIB Batch 3 - Dicoding Academy.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: My very first project in my programming life.

porto.projects.title: Shopper
porto.projects.description: A frontend ecommerce simulation featuring buyer-seller interactions and marketplace-style product management.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: My first framework project. I choose ReactJS and Bootstrap to learn how framework works.

porto.projects.title: Arya's Portfolio Website (old)
porto.projects.description: A modern, light-themed personal website showcasing Arya Pradana’s profile, skills, and front-end development projects in a sleek, interactive one-page design.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: My old portfolio website, used as reference.

porto.projects.title: Note 40 Racing Edition Series
porto.projects.description: Developed a responsive landing page for the Infinix Note 40 Racing Edition Series (including Note 40, Note 40 Pro, Note 40 Pro+, Note 40 5G, and Note 40 Pro+ 5G variant), featuring ScrollMagic scroll animations, Swiper.js carousels and custom interactive UI.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: My first professional project: a landing page for a limited-edition campaign. The page is no longer live; the image is from the ID website’s KV.

porto.projects.title: Note 40 Series
porto.projects.description: Maintained and optimized the Note 40 Series landing pages (Note 40, Note 40 Pro, Note 40 Pro 5G, Note 40 Pro+ 5G, Note 40S), improving performance by 15–20% through ScrollMagic render-frame enhancements and asynchronous rendering.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: The site’s ScrollMagic frame-render system triggers frame changes on scroll, delivering a smooth, movie-like immersive experience.

porto.projects.title: Zero 40 Series
porto.projects.description: Developed, maintained, and optimized the Zero 40 Series (Zero 40 & Zero 40 5G) USP landing page, featuring ScrollMagic animations integrated with SwiperJS for a unique and engaging user experience.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: Whole Zero series is not available in Indonesia, so yeah.. (tip: use VPN on sg region)

porto.projects.title: Zero Flip
porto.projects.description: Zero Flip USP landing page offers a different kind experience of marketing the phone, with new scroll animation using GSAP that have multi scrolled-pin connection, modal triggers and complex function.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: Zero Flip is not available in Indonesia. (tip: use VPN on sg region)

porto.projects.title: Hot 50 Series
porto.projects.description: Developed Hot 50 Series (Hot 50, Hot 50i, Hot 50 5G, Hot 50 Pro+),
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: Hotmoji Event was a campaign that let user to customize emojis on their own picture by choosing frames, background, accessory.

porto.projects.title: Hotmoji Event
porto.projects.description: Led and developed the frontend for Infinix’s Hotmoji Event as the project lead, featuring live image editing, assets (pictures, icons, sticker) customization, and social sharing integration using modern web technologies.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: Hotmoji Event was a campaign that let user to customize emojis on their own picture by choosing frames, background, accessory.

porto.projects.title: XPAD
porto.projects.description: Developed XPAD landing page using Vue with GSAP and SwiperJS animation.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: A casual landing page for XPAD product.

porto.projects.title: TWS XE 23
porto.projects.description: Developed USP landing page for TWS XE-23 or commonly called Infinix Buds Lite.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: A casual landing page for XPAD product.

porto.projects.title: XClub
porto.projects.description: Maintain XClub (infinix.club), a social media app designed for users to share videos, pictures, and ideas on topics like technology, sports, and entertainment. Develop several features for XClub Front-End and Back-End such as encryption feature and user profile interface.

porto.projects.title: XClub - Backend
porto.projects.description: Maintain several Back-End repository (up to 7 repository) for XClub environment, create and improve feature such as optimizing query sql, create encryption data and handling H5 micro-sites data.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: My first back-end project on my programming journey, handling multi-repositories that affecting each other is kinda fun.

porto.projects.title: XClub - Seasonal Event
porto.projects.description: Develop and maintain H5 microsites for large-scale international events such as PMWC, PMGC and HOK Invitational S3. Micro-sites handle users from XClub apps for certain seasonal event.
porto.projects.clientTestimonial: H5 Microsites is popular terms on China for Seasonal Event website that stand differently from the main website.

skills.title: HTML, CSS & JavaScript
skills.detail: Advanced proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, consistently applied across professional and personal projects to create fast, responsive, and pixel-perfect interfaces. Experienced with Sass/SCSS for modular styling, Axios for API handling, and jQuery for legacy support. Implements clean, reusable, and component-based JavaScript using OOP patterns to maintain code scalability and readability.

projects.name: All Front-End Projects (USP Landing Pages, Hotmoji Event, XOS Page, etc.)
projects.description: Core foundation of every landing page built for Infinix — responsible for semantic markup, responsive layouts, and optimized performance across devices.

skills.title: VueJS & NuxtJS
skills.detail: Hands-on experience building high-performance microsites and landing pages using Vue 2 and Nuxt.js frameworks. Specialized in dynamic rendering, multilingual JSON-based localization, and animation systems using GSAP. Migrated the team’s animation framework from ScrollMagic to GSAP, achieving ~20% cleaner codebase and ~15% faster loading time. Familiar with Vuex state management, reusable components, and SSR rendering for SEO optimization.

projects.name: Infinix Landing Pages (Note 40, Zero Flip, Hotmoji Event, XPAD, etc.)
projects.description: Developed and led multiple USP landing pages end-to-end. Served as project leader for Zero Flip and Hotmoji Event — delivering production-grade, animated microsites with efficient data-driven rendering.

projects.name: InfinixMobility.com Integration
projects.description: Integrated Nuxt-based landing pages with Magento backend APIs for seamless deployment across multiple localized sites.

skills.title: ReactJS, NextJS & TypeScript
skills.detail: Proficient in building scalable and maintainable web applications using React and Next.js. Skilled with Hooks, Context API, and modular state management using Zustand and Redux. Experienced in integrating REST and Firebase APIs, as well as handling client-side caching and tokenized messaging systems. Uses TypeScript for strong typing, improving refactoring safety and reducing runtime errors.

projects.name: 2Sweet (AI-Driven Social Platform)
projects.description: Developed an AI-integrated social app with features like tokenized chat system, donation system, image composition, and memory storage — built entirely with Next.js, Ant Design, and Firebase integration.

skills.title: Ant Design (ANTD)
skills.detail: Experienced in creating professional-grade UI systems using Ant Design. Adept at customizing components, building structured forms, modals, tables, and admin dashboards. Focused on code reusability, visual consistency, and accessible interaction design. Often combines ANTD with Zustand or Context API for global state control and better component decoupling.

projects.name: 2Sweet Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Built dynamic, modular admin interface for managing AI chat logs, user events, and content moderation — with responsive layouts and Ant Design components.

skills.title: Magento 2
skills.detail: Strong understanding of Magento 2’s frontend integration, module customization, and multi-store management. Experienced in developing features like OTP verification, address hierarchy (province → city → district), and CSV/Excel export functionality. Skilled at debugging Magento core modules and optimizing data flow between Vue-based frontends and Magento REST APIs.

projects.name: InfinixMobility & XPARK Platforms
projects.description: Collaborated in extending Magento-based e-commerce with Vue integrations — improving checkout flow, translation handling, and content management efficiency.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: Front End Engineer with 1+ years of experience in Vue/React ecosystems, specializing in Nuxt.js and Next.js frameworks. Proficient in Magento development, REST API integration, and object-oriented programming. While focusing on front-end, actively learning and developing backend using PHP and JavaScript. Daily experience with design tools including Figma, Adobe XD, and Photoshop for UI/UX implementation.

experience.positions.title: Front-End Developer
experience.positions.description: Developed seasonal gaming event platforms (PMGC, PMSL, HOK Invitational), XClub community websites, and business intelligence dashboards utilizing Vue.js and ANTDesign. Maintained XPARK and InfiniixMobility e-commerce platforms on Magento framework, utilized PHP and MySQL for backend. Integrated with Next.js that allows users to create conversational experiences with deceased individuals using personal data. Implemented transaction concurrency through Midtrans and managed digital persona using the 2Sweet project.

experience.positions.title: Junior Front-End Developer
experience.positions.description: Developed and maintained landing pages (USP) for Infinix product lines including smartphones, tablets, and TWS devices using Vue.js framework. Led a comprehensive code optimization initiative, transforming functional programming architecture into a highly OOP-oriented object-oriented structure, improving code maintainability and scalability. Promoted to Project Leader for technical supervision and led team coordination for landing page projects.

experience.positions.title: Front-End Developer Intern
experience.positions.description: Lead and managed a team of 4 developers in a Capstone Project, creating a recipe catalog, blog, and discussion forum 'Buku Resepku'. Developed front-end architecture by using - Attention to excellent features.

experience.positions.title: WordPress Developer
experience.positions.description: Developing a WordPress website to be used as a platform for promotion, information dissemination, and registration for Seminar purposes and Template.
